013package org.apache.juneau.rest.arg;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.internal.StringUtils.*;
016
017import org.apache.juneau.http.response.*;
018import org.apache.juneau.reflect.*;
019
020/**
021 * General exception due to a malformed Java parameter.
022 *
023 * <ul class='seealso'>
024 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="../../../../../overview-summary.html#juneau-rest-server.jrs.RestOpAnnotatedMethods.jrs.JavaMethodParameters">Java Method Parameters</a>
025 * </ul>
026 *
027 * @serial exclude
028 */
029public class ArgException extends InternalServerError {
030   private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
031
032   /**
033    * Constructor.
034    *
035    * @param pi The parameter with the issue.
036    * @param msg The message.
037    * @param args The message args.
038    */
039   public ArgException(ParamInfo pi, String msg, Object...args) {
040      super(format(msg, args) + " on parameter "+pi.getIndex()+" of method "+pi.getMethod().getFullName()+".");
041   }
042}
